channel.title: A good, slick and non-complicated forum?
channel.description:
So I'm looking to make a forum to display my servers and my webclients but theres millions of forums out there... I'm looking to find a slick, easy-to-maneuver and non-complicated forum. [b]Does anyone know any good forums to do this on?[/b]
[b]Note:[/b] I don't want to make my OWN forum, I mean a forum on a forum site, like [myforum.forums.com] Sorry if this didn't make sense!

item.title: A good, slick and non-complicated forum?

mybb every time
